verses.verse: Then Jacob<WH3290> went on<WH5375> his journey<WH7272>, and came<WH3212> to the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of the east<WH6924>.

And he looked<WH7200>, and<WH875>, behold, a well in the field<WH7704>, and<WH7969>, lo, three flocks<WH5739> of sheep<WH6629> lying<WH7257> there by it<WH875>; for out of that well they watered<WH8248> the flocks<WH5739>: and the stone<WH68> upon the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310> was great<WH1419>.

And thither were all the flocks<WH5739> gathered<WH622>: and they rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310>, and watered<WH8248> the sheep<WH6629>, and put<WH7725> the stone<WH68> again<WH7725> upon the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310> in its place<WH4725>.
And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto them<WH251>, My brethren, whence<WH370> are ye<WH559>? And they said, Of Haran are we<WH2771>.
And he said<WH559> unto them<WH3045>, Know ye Laban<WH3837> the son<WH1121> of Nahor<WH5152>? And they said<WH559>, We know him<WH3045>.
And he said<WH559> unto them<WH7965>, Is it well with him<WH559>? And they said, It is well<WH7965>: and<WH7354>, behold, Rachel his daughter<WH1323> cometh<WH935> with the sheep<WH6629>.

And he said<WH559>, Lo<WH2005>, it is yet high<WH1419> day<WH3117>, neither is it time<WH6256> that the cattle<WH4735> should be gathered together<WH622>: water<WH8248> ye the sheep<WH6629>, and go<WH3212> and feed them<WH7462>.

And they said<WH559>, We cannot<WH3201>, until all the flocks<WH5739> be gathered together<WH622>, and they roll<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310>; then we water<WH8248> the sheep<WH6629>.
While he was yet<WH5750> speaking<WH1696> with them<WH7354>, Rachel came<WH935> with her father<WH1>'s sheep<WH6629>; for she kept them<WH7462>.

And it came to pass<WH3290>, when Jacob saw<WH7200> Rachel<WH7354> the daughter<WH1323> of Laban<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother<WH251>, and the sheep<WH6629> of Laban<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother<WH251>, that Jacob<WH3290> went near<WH5066>, and rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310>, and watered<WH8248> the flock<WH6629> of Laban<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother<WH251>.
And Jacob<WH3290> kissed<WH5401> Rachel<WH7354>, and lifted up<WH5375> his voice<WH6963>, and wept<WH1058>.
And Jacob<WH3290> told<WH5046> Rachel<WH7354> that he was her father<WH1>'s brother<WH251>, and that he was Rebekah<WH7259>'s son<WH1121>: and she ran<WH7323> and told<WH5046> her father<WH1>.

And it came to pass<WH3837>, when Laban heard<WH8085> the tidings<WH8088> of Jacob<WH3290> his sister<WH269>'s son<WH1121>, that he ran<WH7323> to meet<WH7125> him<WH2263>, and embraced him<WH5401>, and kissed him<WH935>, and brought him to his house<WH1004>. And he told<WH5608> Laban<WH3837> all these things<WH1697>.
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> to him<WH389>, Surely thou art my bone<WH6106> and my flesh<WH1320>. And he abode<WH3427> with him the space<WH3117> of a month<WH2320>.
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> unto Jacob<WH3290>, Because thou art my brother<WH251>, shouldest thou therefore serve<WH5647> me for nought<WH2600>? tell<WH5046> me<WH4909>, what shall thy wages be?
And Laban<WH3837> had two<WH8147> daughters<WH1323>: the name<WH8034> of the elder<WH1419> was Leah<WH3812>, and the name<WH8034> of the younger<WH6996> was Rachel<WH7354>.
And Leah<WH3812>'s eyes<WH5869> were tender<WH7390>; but Rachel<WH7354> was beautiful<WH3303> and<WH3303> well-favored<WH4758>.
And Jacob<WH3290> loved<WH157> Rachel<WH7354>; and he said<WH559>, I will serve<WH5647> thee seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel<WH7354> thy younger<WH6996> daughter<WH1323>.
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559>, It is better<WH2896> that I give<WH5414> her to thee<WH5414>, than that I should give her to another<WH312> man<WH376>: abide with me<WH3427>.
And Jacob<WH3290> served<WH5647> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel<WH7354>; and they seemed<WH5869> unto him but a few<WH259> days<WH3117>, for the love he had to her<WH160>.
And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto Laban<WH3837>, Give<WH3051> me my wife<WH802>, for my days<WH3117> are fulfilled<WH4390>, that I may go in unto her<WH935>.
And Laban<WH3837> gathered together<WH622> all the men<WH582> of the place<WH4725>, and made<WH6213> a feast<WH4960>.
And it came to pass in the evening<WH6153>, that he took<WH3947> Leah<WH3812> his daughter<WH1323>, and brought<WH935> her to him<WH935>; and he went in unto her.
And Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> Zilpah<WH2153> his handmaid<WH8198> unto his daughter<WH1323> Leah<WH3812> for a handmaid<WH8198>.

And it came to pass in the morning<WH1242> that<WH3812>, behold, it was Leah: and he said<WH559> to Laban<WH3837>, What is this thou hast done<WH6213> unto me<WH5647>? did not I serve with thee for Rachel<WH7354>? wherefore then hast thou beguiled me<WH7411>?
And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559>, It is not so done<WH6213> in our place<WH4725>, to give<WH5414> the younger<WH6810> before<WH6440> the first-born<WH1067>.

Fulfil <WH4390> the week<WH7620> of this one<WH2063>, and we will give<WH5414> thee the other also for the service<WH5656> which thou shalt serve<WH5647> with me yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years<WH8141>.
And Jacob<WH3290> did<WH6213> so<WH4390>, and fulfilled her week<WH7620>: and he gave<WH5414> him Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802>.
And Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> Bilhah<WH1090> his handmaid<WH8198> to be her handmaid<WH8198>.
And he went in<WH935> also unto Rachel<WH7354>, and he loved<WH157> also Rachel<WH7354> more than Leah<WH3812>, and served<WH5647> with him yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years<WH8141>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that Leah<WH3812> was hated<WH8130>, and he opened<WH6605> her womb<WH7358>: but Rachel<WH7354> was barren<WH6135>.

And Leah<WH3812> conceived<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>, and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Reuben<WH7205>: for<WH3588> she said<WH559>, Because<WH3588> Jehovah<WH3068> hath looked<WH7200> upon my affliction<WH6040>; for now<WH3588> my husband<WH376> will love me<WH157>.

And she conceived<WH2029> again<WH3205>, and bare a son<WH1121>: and said<WH559>, Because Jehovah<WH3068> hath heard<WH8085> that I am hated<WH8130>, he hath therefore given<WH5414> me this son also<WH7121>: and she called his name<WH8034> Simeon<WH8095>.

And she conceived again<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and said<WH559>, Now this time<WH6471> will my husband<WH376> be joined<WH3867> unto me<WH3205>, because I have borne him three<WH7969> sons<WH1121>: therefore was his name<WH8034> called<WH7121> Levi<WH3878>.

And she conceived<WH2029> again<WH3205>, and bare a son<WH1121>: and she said<WH559>, This<WH6471> time will I praise<WH3034> Jehovah<WH3068>: therefore she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Judah<WH3063>; and she left<WH5975> off bearing<WH3205>.
